scripts.hardhat:test:gas: REPORT_GAS=true COINMARKETCAP_API_KEY=$(security find-generic-password -w -s 'Coinmarketcap API Key') hardhat test
scripts.hardhat:deploy:sepolia: MNEMONIC=$(security find-generic-password -w -s 'Seed Phrase (for Testnets)') INFURA_API_KEY=$(security find-generic-password -w -s 'Infura API key (Solidity Courses)') hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
